text: Marigolds in August is a 1980 South African drama movie directed by Ross Devenish and was based on the play of the same name by Athol Fugard (who also stars). It also stars Winston Ntshona, John Kani, Joyce Hesha, Mabel Ntshinga. ==Other websites== * Category:1980 drama movies Category:South African drama movies Category:Movies set in South Africa
title: Marigolds in August (movie)
